wikipedia_page.main: Paul Chalmers (born 31 October 1963) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a striker for several clubs, primarily St Mirren in Scotland and Swansea City in the English leagues.

link_mentions.page: List of Hamilton Academical F.C. players
List of Bradford City A.F.C. players (1–49 league appearances)

response: * David Chalmers, Stevie Chalmers (son), Paul Chalmers (grandson)

link_mentions.page: List of St Mirren F.C. seasons

response: His son Stevie Chalmers played for Celtic and Scotland, scoring the goal which won the 1967 European Cup Final; he credited his father as a quiet influence and an example to follow in his early life.The Winning Touch: My Autobiography, Stevie Chalmers, Graham McColl; Hachette UK, 2012;  David's grandson (Stevie's son) Paul Chalmers also played professionally.
